text: @realDonaldTrump Too Little Too Late Donny boy you’re a failed President! You failed to respond to the Coronavirus even with warnings! You are failing during this crucible! You are weak and run away from responsibility while blaming among others! Your bone spur draft dodging shows your weakness!
